attributes.action: Ensure the Labour Government calls a general election by the end of 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It doesn't matter who the the next leader of the Labour party is; "just because the conservatives did it" is not an excuse for an unelected Prime Minister to remain in office! 

If Labour is the right party to govern this country then they will win the next election. 

Please sign this petition and give the new leader of Labour a chance to prove he/she is the rightful leader of the UK.

rejection.details:
This service allows you to petition the PM and Government, not the Labour Party. You may wish to sign this other petition though...

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NotBrown/
